notes: Reproduced all 5 compiler errors (4x CS0117, 1x CS1501) as reported. SKMatrix.MakeIdentity(), MakeTranslation(), MakeScale(), MakeRotation() were marked [Obsolete] in v2.88.9 and fully removed in v3.0.0, replaced by CreateIdentity(), CreateTranslation(), CreateScale(), CreateRotation(). PostConcat changed from static 2-arg (ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix) to instance method returning new SKMatrix. This is a documented intentional breaking change in SkiaSharp 3.x — see changelogs/SkiaSharp/3.0.0/SkiaSharp.breaking.md.

reproductionSteps.description: Create standalone console project and add SkiaSharp 3.119.0
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet new console -n Repro --framework net8.0 && cd Repro && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 3.119.0
reproductionSteps.output:
The template "Console App" was created successfully.
PackageReference for package 'SkiaSharp' version '3.119.0' added.

filesCreated.description: Reproduction code using all 5 SKMatrix APIs from the reporter's issue: MakeIdentity, MakeTranslation, MakeScale, MakeRotation, and PostConcat(ref, matrix).
Project file targeting net8.0 with SkiaSharp 3.119.0 package reference.

reproductionSteps.description: Build with SkiaSharp 3.119.0 — expect 5 compiler errors matching reporter's issue
reproductionSteps.output:
Repro net8.0 failed with 5 error(s) (0,2s)
  Program.cs(13,28): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity'
  Program.cs(16,42): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
  Program.cs(19,42): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeScale'
  Program.cs(22,42): error CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeRotation'
  Program.cs(26,10): error CS1501: No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments

Build failed with 5 error(s) in 0,6s

reproductionSteps.description: Verify APIs exist and compile on SkiaSharp 2.88.9 (reporter's last known good version)
reproductionSteps.command: dotnet remove package SkiaSharp && dotnet add package SkiaSharp --version 2.88.9 && dotnet build
reproductionSteps.output:
Repro net8.0 succeeded with 8 warning(s) (0,2s)
  Program.cs(13,19): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeIdentity()' is obsolete: 'Use CreateIdentity() instead.'
  Program.cs(16,33): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeTranslation(float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateTranslation(float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(16,1): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix)' is obsolete: 'Use PostConcat(SKMatrix) instead.'
  Program.cs(19,33): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeScale(float, float, float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateScale(float, float, float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(19,1): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix)' is obsolete: 'Use PostConcat(SKMatrix) instead.'
  Program.cs(22,33): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.MakeRotation(float, float, float)' is obsolete: 'Use CreateRotation(float, float, float) instead.'
  Program.cs(22,1): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix)' is obsolete: 'Use PostConcat(SKMatrix) instead.'
  Program.cs(26,1): warning CS0618: 'SKMatrix.PostConcat(ref SKMatrix, SKMatrix)' is obsolete: 'Use PostConcat(SKMatrix) instead.'

Build succeeded with 8 warning(s) in 0,6s

reproductionSteps.description: Verify on main (source): Make* methods absent, Create* present, all 20 SKMatrixTest tests pass
reproductionSteps.output: Passed!  - Failed: 0, Passed: 20, Skipped: 0, Total: 20, Duration: 31 ms

versionResults.notes: All Make* and PostConcat(ref, matrix) APIs exist and compile successfully. 8 CS0618 obsolete warnings emitted pointing users to Create* replacements.
5 compiler errors: CS0117 for MakeIdentity, MakeTranslation, MakeScale, MakeRotation; CS1501 for PostConcat with 2 arguments.
Same 5 compiler errors as 3.119.0. APIs remain removed in latest stable.
Confirmed Make* methods do not exist in SKMatrix.cs on main. Only Create* methods present. All 20 existing SKMatrixTest tests pass using the Create* API.

errorMessages.primaryError: CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeIdentity' (and 3 more CS0117 for MakeTranslation, MakeScale, MakeRotation) plus CS1501: No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments
additionalErrors: CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeTranslation'
CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeScale'
CS0117: 'SKMatrix' does not contain a definition for 'MakeRotation'
CS1501: No overload for method 'PostConcat' takes 2 arguments

triageCorrections.corrected: Confirmed all 5 compiler errors reproduce exactly as reported. While this is an intentional breaking change, the reported behavior factually occurs — conclusion is 'reproduced' per reproduction rules.
